data: With trenchant swords upraised and poised on high, it seemed as though the two valiant and wrathful combatants stood threatening heaven, and earth, and hell, with such resolution and determination did they bear themselves.
The History of Don Quixote, Volume 1, Part 04
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: classics of literature
